fields.name: position
docs: BASE PRECISION

fields.name: lp_shares
docs: precision: AMM_RESERVE_PRECISION

fields.name: liquidator_fee
docs: precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: if_fee
docs: precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: liability_transfer
docs: precision: token mint precision

fields.name: if_fee
docs: precision: token mint precision

fields.name: scaled_balance
docs: The scaled balance of the position. To get the token amount, multiply by the cumulative deposit/borrow
interest of corresponding market.
precision: token precision

fields.name: cumulative_deposits
docs: The cumulative deposits/borrows a user has made into a market
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: market_index
docs: The market index of the corresponding spot market

fields.name: balance_type
docs: Whether the position is deposit or borrow

fields.name: weight
docs: PERCENTAGE_PRECISION. The weight this constituent has on the perp market

fields.name: len
docs: total elements in the flattened `data` vec

fields.name: len
docs: total elements in the flattened `data` vec

fields.name: last_oracle_price
docs: precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_oracle_conf
docs: precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_oracle_delay
docs: number of slots since last update

fields.name: last_oracle_price_twap
docs: precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_oracle_price_twap5min
docs: precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_oracle_price_twap_ts
docs: unix_timestamp of last snapshot

fields.name: last_index_bid_price
docs: precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_index_ask_price
docs: precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_index_price_twap
docs: precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_index_price_twap5min
docs: precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_index_price_twap_ts
docs: unix_timestamp of last snapshot

fields.name: revenue_withdraw_since_last_settle
docs: The amount of revenue last settled
Positive if funds left the perp market,
negative if funds were pulled into the perp market
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: max_revenue_withdraw_per_period
docs: The max amount of revenue that can be withdrawn per period
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: quote_max_insurance
docs: The max amount of insurance that perp market can use to resolve bankruptcy and pnl deficits
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: quote_settled_insurance
docs: The amount of insurance that has been used to resolve bankruptcy and pnl deficits
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_revenue_withdraw_ts
docs: The last time revenue was settled in/out of market

fields.name: scaled_balance
docs: To get the pool's token amount, you must multiply the scaled balance by the market's cumulative
deposit interest
precision: SPOT_BALANCE_PRECISION

fields.name: market_index
docs: The spot market the pool is for

fields.name: oracle
docs: oracle price data public key

fields.name: historical_oracle_data
docs: stores historically witnessed oracle data

fields.name: base_asset_amount_per_lp
docs: accumulated base asset amount since inception per lp share
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: quote_asset_amount_per_lp
docs: accumulated quote asset amount since inception per lp share
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: fee_pool
docs: partition of fees from perp market trading moved from pnl settlements

fields.name: base_asset_reserve
docs: `x` reserves for constant product mm formula (x * y = k)
precision: AMM_RESERVE_PRECISION

fields.name: quote_asset_reserve
docs: `y` reserves for constant product mm formula (x * y = k)
precision: AMM_RESERVE_PRECISION

fields.name: concentration_coef
docs: determines how close the min/max base asset reserve sit vs base reserves
allow for decreasing slippage without increasing liquidity and v.v.
precision: PERCENTAGE_PRECISION

fields.name: min_base_asset_reserve
docs: minimum base_asset_reserve allowed before AMM is unavailable
precision: AMM_RESERVE_PRECISION

fields.name: max_base_asset_reserve
docs: maximum base_asset_reserve allowed before AMM is unavailable
precision: AMM_RESERVE_PRECISION

fields.name: sqrt_k
docs: `sqrt(k)` in constant product mm formula (x * y = k). stored to avoid drift caused by integer math issues
precision: AMM_RESERVE_PRECISION

fields.name: peg_multiplier
docs: normalizing numerical factor for y, its use offers lowest slippage in cp-curve when market is balanced
precision: PEG_PRECISION

fields.name: terminal_quote_asset_reserve
docs: y when market is balanced. stored to save computation
precision: AMM_RESERVE_PRECISION

fields.name: base_asset_amount_long
docs: always non-negative. tracks number of total longs in market (regardless of counterparty)
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: base_asset_amount_short
docs: always non-positive. tracks number of total shorts in market (regardless of counterparty)
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: base_asset_amount_with_amm
docs: tracks net position (longs-shorts) in market with AMM as counterparty
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: base_asset_amount_with_unsettled_lp
docs: tracks net position (longs-shorts) in market with LPs as counterparty
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: max_open_interest
docs: max allowed open interest, blocks trades that breach this value
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: quote_asset_amount
docs: sum of all user's perp quote_asset_amount in market
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: quote_entry_amount_long
docs: sum of all long user's quote_entry_amount in market
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: quote_entry_amount_short
docs: sum of all short user's quote_entry_amount in market
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: quote_break_even_amount_long
docs: sum of all long user's quote_break_even_amount in market
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: quote_break_even_amount_short
docs: sum of all short user's quote_break_even_amount in market
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: user_lp_shares
docs: total user lp shares of sqrt_k (protocol owned liquidity = sqrt_k - last_funding_rate)
precision: AMM_RESERVE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_funding_rate
docs: last funding rate in this perp market (unit is quote per base)
precision: FUNDING_RATE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_funding_rate_long
docs: last funding rate for longs in this perp market (unit is quote per base)
precision: FUNDING_RATE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_funding_rate_short
docs: last funding rate for shorts in this perp market (unit is quote per base)
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: last24h_avg_funding_rate
docs: estimate of last 24h of funding rate perp market (unit is quote per base)
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: total_fee
docs: total fees collected by this perp market
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: total_mm_fee
docs: total fees collected by the vAMM's bid/ask spread
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: total_exchange_fee
docs: total fees collected by exchange fee schedule
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: total_fee_minus_distributions
docs: total fees minus any recognized upnl and pool withdraws
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: total_fee_withdrawn
docs: sum of all fees from fee pool withdrawn to revenue pool
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: total_liquidation_fee
docs: all fees collected by market for liquidations
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: cumulative_funding_rate_long
docs: accumulated funding rate for longs since inception in market

fields.name: cumulative_funding_rate_short
docs: accumulated funding rate for shorts since inception in market

fields.name: total_social_loss
docs: accumulated social loss paid by users since inception in market

fields.name: ask_base_asset_reserve
docs: transformed base_asset_reserve for users going long
precision: AMM_RESERVE_PRECISION

fields.name: ask_quote_asset_reserve
docs: transformed quote_asset_reserve for users going long
precision: AMM_RESERVE_PRECISION

fields.name: bid_base_asset_reserve
docs: transformed base_asset_reserve for users going short
precision: AMM_RESERVE_PRECISION

fields.name: bid_quote_asset_reserve
docs: transformed quote_asset_reserve for users going short
precision: AMM_RESERVE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_oracle_normalised_price
docs: the last seen oracle price partially shrunk toward the amm reserve price
precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_oracle_reserve_price_spread_pct
docs: the gap between the oracle price and the reserve price = y * peg_multiplier / x

fields.name: last_bid_price_twap
docs: average estimate of bid price over funding_period
precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_ask_price_twap
docs: average estimate of ask price over funding_period
precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_mark_price_twap
docs: average estimate of (bid+ask)/2 price over funding_period
precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_mark_price_twap5min
docs: average estimate of (bid+ask)/2 price over FIVE_MINUTES

fields.name: last_update_slot
docs: the last blockchain slot the amm was updated

fields.name: last_oracle_conf_pct
docs: the pct size of the oracle confidence interval
precision: PERCENTAGE_PRECISION

fields.name: net_revenue_since_last_funding
docs: the total_fee_minus_distribution change since the last funding update
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_funding_rate_ts
docs: the last funding rate update unix_timestamp

fields.name: funding_period
docs: the peridocity of the funding rate updates

fields.name: order_step_size
docs: the base step size (increment) of orders
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: order_tick_size
docs: the price tick size of orders
precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: min_order_size
docs: the minimum base size of an order
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: mm_oracle_slot
docs: the max base size a single user can have
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: volume24h
docs: estimated total of volume in market
QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: long_intensity_volume
docs: the volume intensity of long fills against AMM

fields.name: short_intensity_volume
docs: the volume intensity of short fills against AMM

fields.name: last_trade_ts
docs: the blockchain unix timestamp at the time of the last trade

fields.name: mark_std
docs: estimate of standard deviation of the fill (mark) prices
precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: oracle_std
docs: estimate of standard deviation of the oracle price at each update
precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_mark_price_twap_ts
docs: the last unix_timestamp the mark twap was updated

fields.name: base_spread
docs: the minimum spread the AMM can quote. also used as step size for some spread logic increases.

fields.name: max_spread
docs: the maximum spread the AMM can quote

fields.name: long_spread
docs: the spread for asks vs the reserve price

fields.name: short_spread
docs: the spread for bids vs the reserve price

fields.name: mm_oracle_price
docs: MM oracle price

fields.name: max_fill_reserve_fraction
docs: the fraction of total available liquidity a single fill on the AMM can consume

fields.name: max_slippage_ratio
docs: the maximum slippage a single fill on the AMM can push

fields.name: curve_update_intensity
docs: the update intensity of AMM formulaic updates (adjusting k). 0-100

fields.name: amm_jit_intensity
docs: the jit intensity of AMM. larger intensity means larger participation in jit. 0 means no jit participation.
(0, 100] is intensity for protocol-owned AMM. (100, 200] is intensity for user LP-owned AMM.

fields.name: oracle_source
docs: the oracle provider information. used to decode/scale the oracle public key

fields.name: last_oracle_valid
docs: tracks whether the oracle was considered valid at the last AMM update

fields.name: target_base_asset_amount_per_lp
docs: the target value for `base_asset_amount_per_lp`, used during AMM JIT with LP split
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: per_lp_base
docs: expo for unit of per_lp, base 10 (if per_lp_base=X, then per_lp unit is 10^X)

fields.name: oracle_low_risk_slot_delay_override
docs: the override for the state.min_perp_auction_duration
0 is no override, -1 is disable speed bump, 1-100 is literal speed bump

fields.name: amm_spread_adjustment
docs: signed scale amm_spread similar to fee_adjustment logic (-100 = 0, 100 = double)

fields.name: amm_inventory_spread_adjustment
docs: signed scale amm_spread similar to fee_adjustment logic (-100 = 0, 100 = double)

fields.name: fees_accrued
docs: fees accrued so far for this order slot. This is not exclusively fees from this order_id
and may include fees from other orders in the same market. This may be swept to the
builder's SpotPosition during settle_pnl.

fields.name: order_id
docs: the order_id of the current active order in this slot. It's only relevant while bit_flag = Open

fields.name: fee_tenth_bps
docs: the builder fee on this order, in tenths of a bps, e.g. 100 = 0.01%

fields.name: sub_account_id
docs: the subaccount_id of the user who created this order. It's only relevant while bit_flag = Open

fields.name: builder_idx
docs: the index of the RevenueShareEscrow.approved_builders list, that this order's fee will settle to. Ignored
if bit_flag = Referral.

fields.name: bit_flags
docs: bitflags that describe the state of the order.
[`RevenueShareOrderBitFlag::Init`]: this order slot is available for use.
[`RevenueShareOrderBitFlag::Open`]: this order slot is occupied, `order_id` is the `sub_account_id`'s active order.
[`RevenueShareOrderBitFlag::Completed`]: this order has been filled or canceled, and is waiting to be settled into.
the builder's account order_id and sub_account_id are no longer relevant, it may be merged with other orders.
[`RevenueShareOrderBitFlag::Referral`]: this order stores referral rewards waiting to be settled for this market.
If it is set, no other bitflag should be set.

fields.name: user_order_index
docs: the index into the User's orders list when this RevenueShareOrder was created, make sure to verify that order_id matches.

fields.name: total_fee_paid
docs: Total taker fee paid
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: total_fee_rebate
docs: Total maker fee rebate
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: total_token_discount
docs: Total discount from holding token
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: total_referee_discount
docs: Total discount from being referred
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: total_referrer_reward
docs: Total reward to referrer
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: current_epoch_referrer_reward
docs: Total reward to referrer this epoch
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: scaled_balance
docs: The scaled balance of the position. To get the token amount, multiply by the cumulative deposit/borrow
interest of corresponding market.
precision: SPOT_BALANCE_PRECISION

fields.name: open_bids
docs: How many spot non reduce only trigger orders the user has open
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: open_asks
docs: How many spot non reduce only trigger orders the user has open
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: cumulative_deposits
docs: The cumulative deposits/borrows a user has made into a market
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: market_index
docs: The market index of the corresponding spot market

fields.name: balance_type
docs: Whether the position is deposit or borrow

fields.name: open_orders
docs: Number of open orders

fields.name: last_cumulative_funding_rate
docs: The perp market's last cumulative funding rate. Used to calculate the funding payment owed to user
precision: FUNDING_RATE_PRECISION

fields.name: base_asset_amount
docs: the size of the users perp position
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: quote_asset_amount
docs: Used to calculate the users pnl. Upon entry, is equal to base_asset_amount * avg entry price - fees
Updated when the user open/closes position or settles pnl. Includes fees/funding
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: quote_break_even_amount
docs: The amount of quote the user would need to exit their position at to break even
Updated when the user open/closes position or settles pnl. Includes fees/funding
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: quote_entry_amount
docs: The amount quote the user entered the position with. Equal to base asset amount * avg entry price
Updated when the user open/closes position. Excludes fees/funding
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: open_bids
docs: The amount of non reduce only trigger orders the user has open
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: open_asks
docs: The amount of non reduce only trigger orders the user has open
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: settled_pnl
docs: The amount of pnl settled in this market since opening the position
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: lp_shares
docs: The number of lp (liquidity provider) shares the user has in this perp market
LP shares allow users to provide liquidity via the AMM
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_base_asset_amount_per_lp
docs: The last base asset amount per lp the amm had
Used to settle the users lp position
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_quote_asset_amount_per_lp
docs: The last quote asset amount per lp the amm had
Used to settle the users lp position
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: market_index
docs: The market index for the perp market

fields.name: open_orders
docs: The number of open orders

fields.name: slot
docs: The slot the order was placed

fields.name: price
docs: The limit price for the order (can be 0 for market orders)
For orders with an auction, this price isn't used until the auction is complete
precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: base_asset_amount
docs: The size of the order
precision for perps: BASE_PRECISION
precision for spot: token mint precision

fields.name: base_asset_amount_filled
docs: The amount of the order filled
precision for perps: BASE_PRECISION
precision for spot: token mint precision

fields.name: quote_asset_amount_filled
docs: The amount of quote filled for the order
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: trigger_price
docs: At what price the order will be triggered. Only relevant for trigger orders
precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: auction_start_price
docs: The start price for the auction. Only relevant for market/oracle orders
precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: auction_end_price
docs: The end price for the auction. Only relevant for market/oracle orders
precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: max_ts
docs: The time when the order will expire

fields.name: oracle_price_offset
docs: If set, the order limit price is the oracle price + this offset
precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: order_id
docs: The id for the order. Each users has their own order id space

fields.name: market_index
docs: The perp/spot market index

fields.name: status
docs: Whether the order is open or unused

fields.name: order_type
docs: The type of order

fields.name: market_type
docs: Whether market is spot or perp

fields.name: user_order_id
docs: User generated order id. Can make it easier to place/cancel orders

fields.name: existing_position_direction
docs: What the users position was when the order was placed

fields.name: direction
docs: Whether the user is going long or short. LONG = bid, SHORT = ask

fields.name: reduce_only
docs: Whether the order is allowed to only reduce position size

fields.name: post_only
docs: Whether the order must be a maker

fields.name: immediate_or_cancel
docs: Whether the order must be canceled the same slot it is placed

fields.name: trigger_condition
docs: Whether the order is triggered above or below the trigger price. Only relevant for trigger orders

fields.name: auction_duration
docs: How many slots the auction lasts

fields.name: posted_slot_tail
docs: Last 8 bits of the slot the order was posted on-chain (not order slot for signed msg orders)

fields.name: bit_flags
docs: Bitflags for further classification
0: is_signed_message

fields.name: total_in_amount
docs: total amount to be sold

fields.name: current_in_amount
docs: amount already sold

fields.name: current_out_amount
docs: amount already bought

fields.name: current_out_amount_transferred
docs: amount already transferred to revenue pool

fields.name: current_in_amount_since_last_transfer
docs: amount already bought in epoch

fields.name: epoch_start_ts
docs: start time of epoch

fields.name: epoch_in_amount
docs: amount already bought in epoch

fields.name: epoch_max_in_amount
docs: max amount to swap in epoch

fields.name: epoch_duration
docs: duration of epoch

fields.name: out_market_index
docs: market index to sell

fields.name: in_market_index
docs: market index to buy

fields.name: pubkey
docs: address of the vault.

fields.name: max_aum
docs: The current number of VaultConstituents in the vault, each constituent is pda(LPPool.address, constituent_index)
which constituent is the quote, receives revenue pool distributions. (maybe this should just be implied idx 0)
pub quote_constituent_index: u16,
QUOTE_PRECISION: Max AUM, Prohibit minting new DLP beyond this

fields.name: last_aum
docs: QUOTE_PRECISION: AUM of the vault in USD, updated lazily

fields.name: cumulative_quote_sent_to_perp_markets
docs: QUOTE PRECISION: Cumulative quotes from settles

fields.name: total_mint_redeem_fees_paid
docs: QUOTE_PRECISION: Total fees paid for minting and redeeming LP tokens

fields.name: last_aum_slot
docs: timestamp of last AUM slot

fields.name: padding
docs: timestamp of last vAMM revenue rebalance

fields.name: mint_redeem_id
docs: Every mint/redeem has a monotonically increasing id. This is the next id to use

fields.name: min_mint_fee
docs: PERCENTAGE_PRECISION

fields.name: pubkey
docs: address of the constituent

fields.name: total_swap_fees
docs: total fees received by the constituent. Positive = fees received, Negative = fees paid

fields.name: spot_balance
docs: spot borrow-lend balance for constituent

fields.name: max_weight_deviation
docs: max deviation from target_weight allowed for the constituent
precision: PERCENTAGE_PRECISION

fields.name: swap_fee_min
docs: min fee charged on swaps to/from this constituent
precision: PERCENTAGE_PRECISION

fields.name: swap_fee_max
docs: max fee charged on swaps to/from this constituent
precision: PERCENTAGE_PRECISION

fields.name: max_borrow_token_amount
docs: Max Borrow amount:
precision: token precision

fields.name: vault_token_balance
docs: ata token balance in token precision

fields.name: oracle_staleness_threshold
docs: Delay allowed for valid AUM calculation

fields.name: next_swap_id
docs: Every swap to/from this constituent has a monotonically increasing id. This is the next id to use

fields.name: derivative_weight
docs: percentable of derivatve weight to go to this specific derivative PERCENTAGE_PRECISION. Zero if no derivative weight

fields.name: constituent_derivative_index
docs: The `constituent_index` of the parent constituent. -1 if it is a parent index
Example: if in a pool with SOL (parent) and dSOL (derivative),
SOL.constituent_index = 1, SOL.constituent_derivative_index = -1,
dSOL.constituent_index = 2, dSOL.constituent_derivative_index = 1

fields.name: pubkey
docs: The perp market's address. It is a pda of the market index

fields.name: amm
docs: The automated market maker

fields.name: pnl_pool
docs: The market's pnl pool. When users settle negative pnl, the balance increases.
When users settle positive pnl, the balance decreases. Can not go negative.

fields.name: name
docs: Encoded display name for the perp market e.g. SOL-PERP

fields.name: insurance_claim
docs: The perp market's claim on the insurance fund

fields.name: unrealized_pnl_max_imbalance
docs: The max pnl imbalance before positive pnl asset weight is discounted
pnl imbalance is the difference between long and short pnl. When it's greater than 0,
the amm has negative pnl and the initial asset weight for positive pnl is discounted
precision = QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: expiry_ts
docs: The ts when the market will be expired. Only set if market is in reduce only mode

fields.name: expiry_price
docs: The price at which positions will be settled. Only set if market is expired
precision = PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: next_fill_record_id
docs: Every trade has a fill record id. This is the next id to be used

fields.name: next_funding_rate_record_id
docs: Every funding rate update has a record id. This is the next id to be used

fields.name: next_curve_record_id
docs: Every amm k updated has a record id. This is the next id to be used

fields.name: imf_factor
docs: The initial margin fraction factor. Used to increase margin ratio for large positions
precision: MARGIN_PRECISION

fields.name: unrealized_pnl_imf_factor
docs: The imf factor for unrealized pnl. Used to discount asset weight for large positive pnl
precision: MARGIN_PRECISION

fields.name: liquidator_fee
docs: The fee the liquidator is paid for taking over perp position
precision: LIQUIDATOR_FEE_PRECISION

fields.name: if_liquidation_fee
docs: The fee the insurance fund receives from liquidation
precision: LIQUIDATOR_FEE_PRECISION

fields.name: margin_ratio_initial
docs: The margin ratio which determines how much collateral is required to open a position
e.g. margin ratio of .1 means a user must have $100 of total collateral to open a $1000 position
precision: MARGIN_PRECISION

fields.name: margin_ratio_maintenance
docs: The margin ratio which determines when a user will be liquidated
e.g. margin ratio of .05 means a user must have $50 of total collateral to maintain a $1000 position
else they will be liquidated
precision: MARGIN_PRECISION

fields.name: unrealized_pnl_initial_asset_weight
docs: The initial asset weight for positive pnl. Negative pnl always has an asset weight of 1
precision: SPOT_WEIGHT_PRECISION

fields.name: unrealized_pnl_maintenance_asset_weight
docs: The maintenance asset weight for positive pnl. Negative pnl always has an asset weight of 1
precision: SPOT_WEIGHT_PRECISION

fields.name: number_of_users_with_base
docs: number of users in a position (base)

fields.name: number_of_users
docs: number of users in a position (pnl) or pnl (quote)

fields.name: status
docs: Whether a market is active, reduce only, expired, etc
Affects whether users can open/close positions

fields.name: contract_type
docs: Currently only Perpetual markets are supported

fields.name: contract_tier
docs: The contract tier determines how much insurance a market can receive, with more speculative markets receiving less insurance
It also influences the order perp markets can be liquidated, with less speculative markets being liquidated first

fields.name: quote_spot_market_index
docs: The spot market that pnl is settled in

fields.name: fee_adjustment
docs: Between -100 and 100, represents what % to increase/decrease the fee by
E.g. if this is -50 and the fee is 5bps, the new fee will be 2.5bps
if this is 50 and the fee is 5bps, the new fee will be 7.5bps

fields.name: fuel_boost_position
docs: fuel multiplier for perp funding
precision: 10

fields.name: fuel_boost_taker
docs: fuel multiplier for perp taker
precision: 10

fields.name: fuel_boost_maker
docs: fuel multiplier for perp maker
precision: 10

fields.name: authority
docs: the owner of this account, a builder or referrer

fields.name: authority
docs: the owner of this account, a user

types.name: SignedMsgUserOrders
docs:
* This struct is a duplicate of SignedMsgUserOrdersZeroCopy
 * It is used to give anchor an struct to generate the idl for clients
 * The struct SignedMsgUserOrdersZeroCopy is used to load the data in efficiently

types.name: SignedMsgWsDelegates
docs: * Used to store authenticated delegates for swift-like ws connections

fields.name: pubkey
docs: The address of the spot market. It is a pda of the market index

fields.name: oracle
docs: The oracle used to price the markets deposits/borrows

fields.name: mint
docs: The token mint of the market

fields.name: vault
docs: The vault used to store the market's deposits
The amount in the vault should be equal to or greater than deposits - borrows

fields.name: name
docs: The encoded display name for the market e.g. SOL

fields.name: revenue_pool
docs: Revenue the protocol has collected in this markets token
e.g. for SOL-PERP, funds can be settled in usdc and will flow into the USDC revenue pool

fields.name: spot_fee_pool
docs: The fees collected from swaps between this market and the quote market
Is settled to the quote markets revenue pool

fields.name: insurance_fund
docs: Details on the insurance fund covering bankruptcies in this markets token
Covers bankruptcies for borrows with this markets token and perps settling in this markets token

fields.name: total_spot_fee
docs: The total spot fees collected for this market
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: deposit_balance
docs: The sum of the scaled balances for deposits across users and pool balances
To convert to the deposit token amount, multiply by the cumulative deposit interest
precision: SPOT_BALANCE_PRECISION

fields.name: borrow_balance
docs: The sum of the scaled balances for borrows across users and pool balances
To convert to the borrow token amount, multiply by the cumulative borrow interest
precision: SPOT_BALANCE_PRECISION

fields.name: cumulative_deposit_interest
docs: The cumulative interest earned by depositors
Used to calculate the deposit token amount from the deposit balance
precision: SPOT_CUMULATIVE_INTEREST_PRECISION

fields.name: cumulative_borrow_interest
docs: The cumulative interest earned by borrowers
Used to calculate the borrow token amount from the borrow balance
precision: SPOT_CUMULATIVE_INTEREST_PRECISION

fields.name: total_social_loss
docs: The total socialized loss from borrows, in the mint's token
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: total_quote_social_loss
docs: The total socialized loss from borrows, in the quote market's token
preicision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: withdraw_guard_threshold
docs: no withdraw limits/guards when deposits below this threshold
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: max_token_deposits
docs: The max amount of token deposits in this market
0 if there is no limit
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: deposit_token_twap
docs: 24hr average of deposit token amount
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: borrow_token_twap
docs: 24hr average of borrow token amount
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: utilization_twap
docs: 24hr average of utilization
which is borrow amount over token amount
precision: SPOT_UTILIZATION_PRECISION

fields.name: last_interest_ts
docs: Last time the cumulative deposit and borrow interest was updated

fields.name: last_twap_ts
docs: Last time the deposit/borrow/utilization averages were updated

fields.name: expiry_ts
docs: The time the market is set to expire. Only set if market is in reduce only mode

fields.name: order_step_size
docs: Spot orders must be a multiple of the step size
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: order_tick_size
docs: Spot orders must be a multiple of the tick size
precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: min_order_size
docs: The minimum order size
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: max_position_size
docs: The maximum spot position size
if the limit is 0, there is no limit
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: next_fill_record_id
docs: Every spot trade has a fill record id. This is the next id to use

fields.name: next_deposit_record_id
docs: Every deposit has a deposit record id. This is the next id to use

fields.name: initial_asset_weight
docs: The initial asset weight used to calculate a deposits contribution to a users initial total collateral
e.g. if the asset weight is .8, $100 of deposits contributes $80 to the users initial total collateral
precision: SPOT_WEIGHT_PRECISION

fields.name: maintenance_asset_weight
docs: The maintenance asset weight used to calculate a deposits contribution to a users maintenance total collateral
e.g. if the asset weight is .9, $100 of deposits contributes $90 to the users maintenance total collateral
precision: SPOT_WEIGHT_PRECISION

fields.name: initial_liability_weight
docs: The initial liability weight used to calculate a borrows contribution to a users initial margin requirement
e.g. if the liability weight is .9, $100 of borrows contributes $90 to the users initial margin requirement
precision: SPOT_WEIGHT_PRECISION

fields.name: maintenance_liability_weight
docs: The maintenance liability weight used to calculate a borrows contribution to a users maintenance margin requirement
e.g. if the liability weight is .8, $100 of borrows contributes $80 to the users maintenance margin requirement
precision: SPOT_WEIGHT_PRECISION

fields.name: imf_factor
docs: The initial margin fraction factor. Used to increase liability weight/decrease asset weight for large positions
precision: MARGIN_PRECISION

fields.name: liquidator_fee
docs: The fee the liquidator is paid for taking over borrow/deposit
precision: LIQUIDATOR_FEE_PRECISION

fields.name: if_liquidation_fee
docs: The fee the insurance fund receives from liquidation
precision: LIQUIDATOR_FEE_PRECISION

fields.name: optimal_utilization
docs: The optimal utilization rate for this market.
Used to determine the markets borrow rate
precision: SPOT_UTILIZATION_PRECISION

fields.name: optimal_borrow_rate
docs: The borrow rate for this market when the market has optimal utilization
precision: SPOT_RATE_PRECISION

fields.name: max_borrow_rate
docs: The borrow rate for this market when the market has 1000 utilization
precision: SPOT_RATE_PRECISION

fields.name: decimals
docs: The market's token mint's decimals. To from decimals to a precision, 10^decimals

fields.name: orders_enabled
docs: Whether or not spot trading is enabled

fields.name: asset_tier
docs: The asset tier affects how a deposit can be used as collateral and the priority for a borrow being liquidated

fields.name: max_token_borrows_fraction
docs: What fraction of max_token_deposits
disabled when 0, 1 => 1/10000 => .01% of max_token_deposits
precision: X/10000

fields.name: flash_loan_amount
docs: For swaps, the amount of token loaned out in the begin_swap ix
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: flash_loan_initial_token_amount
docs: For swaps, the amount in the users token account in the begin_swap ix
Used to calculate how much of the token left the system in end_swap ix
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: total_swap_fee
docs: The total fees received from swaps
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: scale_initial_asset_weight_start
docs: When to begin scaling down the initial asset weight
disabled when 0
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: min_borrow_rate
docs: The min borrow rate for this market when the market regardless of utilization
precision: X/200

fields.name: fuel_boost_deposits
docs: fuel multiplier for spot deposits
precision: 10

fields.name: fuel_boost_borrows
docs: fuel multiplier for spot borrows
precision: 10

fields.name: fuel_boost_taker
docs: fuel multiplier for spot taker
precision: 10

fields.name: fuel_boost_maker
docs: fuel multiplier for spot maker
precision: 10

fields.name: fuel_boost_insurance
docs: fuel multiplier for spot insurance stake
precision: 10

fields.name: authority
docs: The owner/authority of the account

fields.name: delegate
docs: An addresses that can control the account on the authority's behalf. Has limited power, cant withdraw

fields.name: name
docs: Encoded display name e.g. "toly"

fields.name: spot_positions
docs: The user's spot positions

fields.name: perp_positions
docs: The user's perp positions

fields.name: orders
docs: The user's orders

fields.name: last_add_perp_lp_shares_ts
docs: The last time the user added perp lp positions

fields.name: total_deposits
docs: The total values of deposits the user has made
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: total_withdraws
docs: The total values of withdrawals the user has made
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: total_social_loss
docs: The total socialized loss the users has incurred upon the protocol
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: settled_perp_pnl
docs: Fees (taker fees, maker rebate, referrer reward, filler reward) and pnl for perps
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: cumulative_spot_fees
docs: Fees (taker fees, maker rebate, filler reward) for spot
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: cumulative_perp_funding
docs: Cumulative funding paid/received for perps
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: liquidation_margin_freed
docs: The amount of margin freed during liquidation. Used to force the liquidation to occur over a period of time
Defaults to zero when not being liquidated
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_active_slot
docs: The last slot a user was active. Used to determine if a user is idle

fields.name: next_order_id
docs: Every user order has an order id. This is the next order id to be used

fields.name: max_margin_ratio
docs: Custom max initial margin ratio for the user

fields.name: next_liquidation_id
docs: The next liquidation id to be used for user

fields.name: sub_account_id
docs: The sub account id for this user

fields.name: status
docs: Whether the user is active, being liquidated or bankrupt

fields.name: is_margin_trading_enabled
docs: Whether the user has enabled margin trading

fields.name: idle
docs: User is idle if they haven't interacted with the protocol in 1 week and they have no orders, perp positions or borrows
Off-chain keeper bots can ignore users that are idle

fields.name: open_orders
docs: number of open orders

fields.name: has_open_order
docs: Whether or not user has open order

fields.name: open_auctions
docs: number of open orders with auction

fields.name: has_open_auction
docs: Whether or not user has open order with auction

fields.name: authority
docs: The authority for all of a users sub accounts

fields.name: referrer
docs: The address that referred this user

fields.name: fees
docs: Stats on the fees paid by the user

fields.name: next_epoch_ts
docs: The timestamp of the next epoch
Epoch is used to limit referrer rewards earned in single epoch

fields.name: maker_volume30d
docs: Rolling 30day maker volume for user
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: taker_volume30d
docs: Rolling 30day taker volume for user
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: filler_volume30d
docs: Rolling 30day filler volume for user
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_maker_volume30d_ts
docs: last time the maker volume was updated

fields.name: last_taker_volume30d_ts
docs: last time the taker volume was updated

fields.name: last_filler_volume30d_ts
docs: last time the filler volume was updated

fields.name: if_staked_quote_asset_amount
docs: The amount of tokens staked in the quote spot markets if

fields.name: number_of_sub_accounts
docs: The current number of sub accounts

fields.name: number_of_sub_accounts_created
docs: The number of sub accounts created. Can be greater than the number of sub accounts if user
has deleted sub accounts

fields.name: referrer_status
docs: Flags for referrer status:
First bit (LSB): 1 if user is a referrer, 0 otherwise
Second bit: 1 if user was referred, 0 otherwise

fields.name: fuel_overflow_status
docs: whether the user has a FuelOverflow account

fields.name: fuel_insurance
docs: accumulated fuel for token amounts of insurance

fields.name: fuel_deposits
docs: accumulated fuel for notional of deposits

fields.name: fuel_borrows
docs: accumulate fuel bonus for notional of borrows

fields.name: fuel_positions
docs: accumulated fuel for perp open interest

fields.name: fuel_taker
docs: accumulate fuel bonus for taker volume

fields.name: fuel_maker
docs: accumulate fuel bonus for maker volume

fields.name: if_staked_gov_token_amount
docs: The amount of tokens staked in the governance spot markets if

fields.name: last_fuel_if_bonus_update_ts
docs: last unix ts user stats data was used to update if fuel (u32 to save space)

fields.name: authority
docs: The authority of this overflow account
